name: Epyka
summary: EPYKA charts the adventures of archaeologist Scott Hudson and his trusty dog Jack as they search for evidence of Earth’s first civilisation. But when the duo stumbles upon a mysterious, undiscovered island, they soon find more than they ever bargained for. Uncovering an evil that threatens the very future of humankind the pair must work together to solve ancient, magical puzzles, uncover Epyka’s wondrous secrets, defeat a malevolent force and ultimately fulfil a destiny they never expected.
